availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p:
Twelfth governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, attorney and judge. Virginia native. Married to Susan Forsythe. Father of James Clark, Sarah Ann Clark, and Susan Clark.
Member of the United States House of Representatives from Kentucky from 1813 to 1816 and from 1825 to 1831. Speaker of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1832. Governor of Kentucky from 1836 to 1839.

ab.bibl:
Appletons' Cyclopedia of American Biography, 1600-1889, Vol. 1 (New York: D. Appleton and Company, 1888), p. 628.
Find A Grave, "James Clark (1779-1839)," Memorial #19299462, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/19299462 (accessed May 5, 2020).
